Public instance methods

void Use(Type implementationType)

Configures the underlying container to use the specified implementation type whenever an instance of the interface type in the container is resolved.
Parameters
Type implementationType

Specifies the implementation type to be used.

void Use(object implementation)

Configures the underlying container to use the specified instance whenever an instance of the interface type in the container is resolved.
Parameters
object implementation

Specifies the instance to be used.
